nodes.text: Estaria was a planet that was located within the Estaria system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Indrexu sector. A part of the historical Greater Tion region, Estaria was connected by the Perlemian Trade Route hyperlane to the planets Ank Ki'Shor and Makem Te, while the Tion Trade Route linked it to the world of Endregaad. Estaria served as the capital of the Indrexu sector and was a spaceport that serviced the many starships traveling between the Tion Cluster and the worlds of the Far Perlemian region. The Human Tionese people considered Estaria to be only moderately corrupt.
Estaria was first mentioned in the 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article Xim Week: The History of Xim and the Tion Cluster, written by Jason Fry. The article placed the planet in grid square S-5.
